Content:
Trying out the GoPro 12 riding to Ymuiden on the Yamaha tracer 7

Great day for testing the new GoPro 12 on this spring day.
Riding from Amsterdam to IJmuiden get get myself some nice fish for lunch.
Let's see how the image stabilization, hyper smooth 2.0, holds up on a motorcycle ride like this and test out some mic setups.

Enjoy the ride, Jaamaan123
